author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson [prin]ter to His most sacred Majesty,
notes: "Given under our signet at Edinburgh, the fifth day of March, one thousand six hundred eighty and one, and of our raign, the thretty [sic] three year."
Imperfect; torn at foot affecting imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Aberdeen City Charter Room.
